ModMetaData.name: Diet Cannibal Meals
ModMetaData.author: Gay_Robot
ModMetaData.description:
Have a colony of cannibals that eat the bodies of their victims too quickly? Put them on a diet!
This mod add the following meals;
Simple cannibal meals require 1 human meat + anything else. Fine cannibal meals require 2 human meat + other meats + veg. lavish cannibal meals require 4 human meat + other meats + veg.
Disallow human meat in the bills menu to restrict the meals to minimum required human meat (and keep the cannibals on their diet).
On [Github](https://github.com/Legitra/Diet_Cannibalism_Mod)
